content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data'
    ) AS [result]


--Identify the interred data types
 EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data''
    ) AS [result]
'
--Spicify custom data types 
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data'
    ) 
    with(
       VendorID  int,
       lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
       lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
       store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
       RatecodeID int,
       PULocationID int,
       DOLocationID int,
       passenger_count int,
       trip_distance FLOAT,
       fare_amount FLOAT,
       extra FLOAT,
       mta_tax FLOAT,
       tip_amount FLOAT,
       tolls_amount FLOAT,
       ehail_fee INT,
       improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
       total_amount FLOAT,
       payment_type INT,
       trip_type INT,
       congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )AS [result]

-- select only requried columns to reduse the cost

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data'
    ) 
    with(
       tip_amount FLOAT,
       trip_type INT       
    )AS [result]

--Query data from folder using wildcard characters
SELECT
   top 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data'
    )AS [result]

-- use the filename()
SELECT
   result.filename() As [filename],
   count(1) as recordcount
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data'
    )AS [result]
GROUP BY result.filename()
order by 1
-- use the filepath()
SELECT
   result.filepath() as [filepath],
   result.filepath(1) as [YEAR] ,
   result.filepath(2) as [MONTH],
   count(1) as recordcount
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data'
    )AS [result]
GROUP BY result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2),result.filepath()
order by 2,3 
-- Query to get records from subfolders
SELECT
   top 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data'
    )AS [result]

-- use file path function to select certain files only
SELECT
   result.filepath() as [filepath],
   result.filepath(1) as [YEAR] ,
   result.filepath(2) as [MONTH],
   count(1) as recordcount
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data'
    )AS [result]
WHERE result.filepath(1) = 2020 AND result.filepath(2) = 02
GROUP BY result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2),result.filepath()
order by 2,3
